Literature.Title: Computational Design of Pore-Forming Peptides with Potent Antimicrobial and Anticancer Activities
Literature.Author: Deb R, Torres MDT, Boudný M, Koběrská M, Cappiello F, Popper M, Dvořáková Bendová K, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>50 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=>128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli TOP 10(MIC=>50µM),Staphylococcus carnosus CCM 4838T(MIC=12.5µM),Enterococcus faecium Z906(MIC=>32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae E1120(MIC=28µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae E1267(MIC=>32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 4371(MIC=>32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii Z13(MIC=25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa K12(MIC=>32µM),Escherichia coli E1098(MIC=12µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=100µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=>128µM)
